summary.para: The CMSG_CTRL_DEL_SIGNER_UNAUTH_ATTR_PARA structure is used to delete an unauthenticated attribute of a signer of a signed message. This structure is passed to if the dwCrlType parameter is CMSG_CTRL_DEL_SIGNER_UNAUTH_ATTR.
Size of this structure in bytes.
Index of the signer in the rgSigners array of pointers to structures in a signed message's structure. The unauthenticated attribute for this signer is deleted.
Index of the element in the rgUnauthAttr array of the structure holding the unauthenticated attribute to be removed.
